title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 345.10 - Designation of beneficiary
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 345.10 - Designation of beneficiary

State Regulations
(a) A
beneficiary may be designated in accordance with the provisions of sections
90
and
390
of the Retirement and Social Security

Law. Each such designation shall be: (1)
made
in writing on a blank provided by the Comptroller for such a purpose; and
(2)
ineffective until it is
filed in the office of the Comptroller. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
345.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
